content:
Congratulations on discovering the benefits of exercise on your mental health! That's amazing!

Of course, I'd be happy to help you find yoga studios in your new neighborhood that offer beginner classes. To do so, I'll need a bit more information from you. Could you please provide me with:

1. Your neighborhood or city?
2. Your preferred style of yoga (e.g., Hatha, Vinyasa, Restorative, Yin, etc.) or if you're open to trying different styles?
3. What's your schedule like? Are you looking for morning, evening, or weekend classes?
4. Do you have any specific amenities in mind (e.g., heated rooms, meditation classes, workshops, etc.)?

Once I have this information, I can provide you with a list of yoga studios in your area that offer beginner classes and cater to your needs.

Remember, yoga is a great way to continue nurturing your mental health, and I'm excited to help you find a studio that suits you!
